game.name: Barbie Family cooking Berry Pie
game.description:
ultimate cooking skills. This time they all have gathered in the kitchen to prepare some highly delicious Berry Pie. In this free online cooking game for girls, you will have to help the Barbie superhero family to cook the best dessert ever. Although the task is not easy at all, it requires to pay attention to the vital details to get through all the hurdles that you might face during the gameplay. 

Barbie is proud to have a united family who always enjoy when cooking together. As you know that summer is just around the corner, so nothing could be better than trying out the berry pie, which is a favorite recipe of the entire Barbie family. Join the family to have fun together in the kitchen in this best cooking game for girls and boys. In the first level, visit a nearest supermarket to buy some needful ingredients for the recipe. 

Once the shopping is done, take a bowl and mix some crackers with some salt and butter. Use an oven to bake them properly. Now use some fresh and tasty forest berries and also add the extremely delicious vanilla extract on the top of them. Also add some heavy cream, sugar, lemon juice and cornstarch. Keep mixing all of them together until you obtain a perfect cream, that needs to be heat up on a stove. Then take the biscuit crust you have made earlier and use this cream as a filling over them. Also sprinkle some extra berries on top of that. Use an oven then to bake your pie. Good luck to have the best time in this cool kitchen game!
